author: Brian Buntz
title: Avnet Sees Tangible Benefits in Maker Community Sites
description: A growing number of users on the maker community sites Hackster and Element14 are taking hobby-based IoT product ideas into full-scale production.
content: Engineers can be artists, says Bob Merriman, who leads Avnet’s strategy in the maker and startup markets. While the stereotype holds that analytical, math-driven individuals don’t tend to be imaginative, Merriman points to Avnet’s online collaborative network… [+3438 chars]
fileName: Avnet Sees Tangible Benefits in Maker Community Sites
text: A growing number of users on the maker community sites Hackster and Element14 are taking hobby-based IoT product ideas into full-scale production.
